scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Board of Trustees of the Brooklyn Fire Department meeting minutes span the period 1848 to 1854 and are housed in a single hardbound volume. The minutes list the members and officers of the board for each year and record votes taken and motions passed at each meeting. Topics discussed at the meetings most often included financial transactions and ammendments to the constitution and bylaws of the board.
